title: Hometown Heartbreaker
description: He broke her heart onceâ€¦  Ruby Cooper has spent her adult life trying to forget a one night stand with hometown golden boy Dane Anderson, a night that left Ruby pregnant and alone. Now, ten years later, Ruby's number one goal is to find the daughter she was forced to give up.  When a cruel twist of fate reunites Dane Anderson with the daughter he gave away, he has no choice but to put his own dreams on hold to raise her. Resigned to the life he leads, Dane's upset when Ruby returns to town, determined to insert herself in their daughter's life.  Forced to co-parent, Ruby and Dane can't deny the physical attraction between them, but remembered heartbreak and trust issues divide them over and over again.  In the end, will Ruby and Dane finally take a chance on love and learn to trust their hearts. or will they be torn apart forever?
author: Joleen James
